summary: This document appears to be an email or correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, referencing a PowerPoint presentation attachment titled 'GM Final.pptx'. The document is part of the Epstein case files and likely relates to legal proceedings or evidence presentation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney

keyFacts: The document is correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
It includes an attachment titled 'GM Final.pptx', suggesting a PowerPoint presentation related to the case.
The correspondence date is June 28, 2020, indicating ongoing legal activity related to Epstein years after his death.
The document originates from the Southern District of New York, which was a key jurisdiction in Epstein-related prosecutions.
